value:
It's so lively here with people from so
many different worlds. It reminds me
of my own travels.$k$pI wonder how everyone is doing...

As a queen, every day is quite busy—
but also quite fulfilling. I couldn't
be happier.$k$pI do face every day with Alm, after all.

In my world, two long-warring
kingdoms are finally at peace. And
now, it's Askr's turn.

The flowers in the garden are in full
bloom. They're beautiful, aren't they?
Let's take a stroll together.

May all those precious to me, and
everyone in my kingdom, know
happiness... Now and forever.$k$pHm? Oh, I was just finishing saying
my prayers to the goddess Mila.

Your ally asked me to come say hello.
Be sure to remain good friends with
$Nf, OK?

To think I could grow this much!
It's all thanks to you and Alm.

I mustn't stop growing simply
because I've become a queen.

My apologies... Perhaps I haven't
been as focused as I should be...

Even now, I continue to be
surprised by my own potential.

I'm Celica, queen of the One Kingdom
of Valentia. If I can help this world find
peace, too, then I simply must.

Now that Alm and I rule our kingdom,
we spend all our time together. I'm so
happy for that, but I wonder...$k$pEvery day, Alm is stuck inside the
castle, busy with the tasks of his new
position.$k$pSometimes when I look into his eyes,
I think he'd rather be charging into
battle, sword held overhead.$k$pI don't wish for him to be in such
danger, of course... But I do want him
to be true to himself.$k$pBeing summoned here by you,
however, has reminded me of
something.$k$pIt takes resolve not only to fight when
called upon, but also to lay down your
arms in times of peace.$k$pIf someday the two of us must once
again march onto the battlefield, I
won't hesitate to do what I must.$k$pI have you to thank for reminding me
of my own resolve.
たあっ！
いくわよ！
きゃああっ！
油断したわ…
You should pray.
Mila guide me!
I shall stop you!
For the future of this land!
Alm... I'm sorry...
Hm?
I'm Celica. Queen of the One Kingdom of Valentia.
Wha—?! Oh, it's you. You're such a trickster.
Right now, I'm just happy I can be with Alm.
I'm a little sad that I can't see my former traveling companions... And it makes me feel a little lonely.
Our duty is to Valentia. We'll transform it into a land of abundance, where people no longer make war with one another.
Don't let me go, Alm... Don't ever leave my side.
I believe in you. Never give up.
I have hope.
Like this?
Leave it to me.
